description: The Zendo Collection has always been an easy win with the ladies, and now Outdoor Research is thrilled to extend its comfort, stretch, and performance in a pull-on pair of shorts for guys. The Zendo Shorts' climbing-inspired silhouette make every move effortless, whether you're gunning up an overhanging boulder problem or high-stepping a slab to your next bolt. More than just a climbing accessory, the Zendo fabric is, and always will be, perfect for anyone spending time outside on the trail, at the crag, in the sun, or just lounging around.
name: Outdoor Research Zendo Shorts, 10" Inseam - Mens
